text: لِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌۢ

translation.en.sahih: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is within them. And He is over all things competent.
translation.id.indonesian: Kepunyaan Allah-lah kerajaan langit dan bumi dan apa yang ada di dalamnya; dan Dia Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu.
